title: How to Make Medical Marijuana Brownies

steps.headline: Fill the large pot with water and boil.
steps.description: Then place the glass bowl over it so it sits over the pan. Do not let the glass bowl sit into the water as the temperature will be too high. Once water is boiling, change heat to medium-low and place butter into the bowl.

steps.headline: Add 1 cup of water, and 10 grams of marijuana into the bowl once the butter is melted.
steps.description: Continue to stir for at least an hour. Note: make sure the marijuana has been lightly ground.

steps.headline: Place the cheesecloth over the aluminum pan and pour the butter mix into the pan.
steps.description: This should filter all the leftover marijuana out. Make sure to get as much of the liquid out of the cheesecloth to gain more yield. Once all the liquid is extracted, freeze for 40 minutes.

steps.headline: Remove the pan from the freezer after 40 minutes and poke a hole on the bottom of the pan.
steps.description: this should remove any excess water from the butter. Once the water is removed, the butter is complete and ready to be added to the brownie mixture.

steps.headline: Sift together 1 cup of flour, ¾ cup of cocoa powder, ½ teaspoon of baking powder, and ⅛ teaspoon of salt in a bowl.
Blend the butter.
steps.description: (note: place butter in a microwave for 20 seconds to melt it), 2 cups of sugar, 2 teaspoons of vanilla extract, 4 eggs, 3 tablespoons of peanut butter, and 3 tablespoons of Nutella together in a separate bowl. (The Nutella and peanut butter should also be melted down in the microwave for about 20 seconds.)

steps.headline: Mix the two bowls of ingredients together using a whisk or electric whisk.
steps.description: Once mixed, place into a baking pan.

steps.headline: Place in oven for 30 minutes.
steps.description: Allow to cool and then enjoy!

tyn: Large pot and a larger glass bowl that sits on the pot (or a double boiler)
text: Making the Butter Fill the large pot with water and boil. Then place the glass bowl over it so it sits over the pan. Do not let the glass bowl sit into the water as the temperature will be too high. Once water is boiling, change heat to medium-low and place butter into the bowl. Add 1 cup of water, and 10 grams of marijuana into the bowl once the butter is melted. Continue to stir for at least an hour. Note: make sure the marijuana has been lightly ground. Place the cheesecloth over the aluminum pan and pour the butter mix into the pan. This should filter all the leftover marijuana out. Make sure to get as much of the liquid out of the cheesecloth to gain more yield. Once all the liquid is extracted, freeze for 40 minutes. Remove the pan from the freezer after 40 minutes and poke a hole on the bottom of the pan. this should remove any excess water from the butter. Once the water is removed, the butter is complete and ready to be added to the brownie mixture. Making the Brownies Preheat oven to 350℉ (175℃).  Sift together 1 cup of flour, ¾ cup of cocoa powder, ½ teaspoon of baking powder, and ⅛ teaspoon of salt in a bowl.  Blend the butter. (note: place butter in a microwave for 20 seconds to melt it), 2 cups of sugar, 2 teaspoons of vanilla extract, 4 eggs, 3 tablespoons of peanut butter, and 3 tablespoons of Nutella together in a separate bowl. (The Nutella and peanut butter should also be melted down in the microwave for about 20 seconds.) Mix the two bowls of ingredients together using a whisk or electric whisk. Once mixed, place into a baking pan. Place in oven for 30 minutes. Allow to cool and then enjoy! Finished.
sentences: Making the Butter Fill the large pot with water and boil.
Then place the glass bowl over it so it sits over the pan.
Do not let the glass bowl sit into the water as the temperature will be too high.
Once water is boiling, change heat to medium-low and place butter into the bowl.
Add 1 cup of water, and 10 grams of marijuana into the bowl once the butter is melted.
Continue to stir for at least an hour.
Note: make sure the marijuana has been lightly ground.
Place the cheesecloth over the aluminum pan and pour the butter mix into the pan.
This should filter all the leftover marijuana out.
Make sure to get as much of the liquid out of the cheesecloth to gain more yield.
Once all the liquid is extracted, freeze for 40 minutes.
Remove the pan from the freezer after 40 minutes and poke a hole on the bottom of the pan.
this should remove any excess water from the butter.
Once the water is removed, the butter is complete and ready to be added to the brownie mixture.
Making the Brownies Preheat oven to 350℉ (175℃).
Sift together 1 cup of flour, ¾ cup of cocoa powder, ½ teaspoon of baking powder, and ⅛ teaspoon of salt in a bowl.
Blend the butter.

(note: place butter in a microwave for 20 seconds to melt it), 2 cups of sugar, 2 teaspoons of vanilla extract, 4 eggs, 3 tablespoons of peanut butter, and 3 tablespoons of Nutella together in a separate bowl.
(The Nutella and peanut butter should also be melted down in the microwave for about 20 seconds.)
Mix the two bowls of ingredients together using a whisk or electric whisk.
Once mixed, place into a baking pan.
Place in oven for 30 minutes.
Allow to cool and then enjoy!
Finished.
